LanguageData.GhoulCommands.EnableJuggernautSerumDesc: Enable Juggernaut Serum Auto-Use Gizmo Button
LanguageData.GhoulCommands.ToggleJuggernautSerumDesc: Toggle whether the ghoul automatically uses Juggernaut Serum. A red cross indicates the default behaviour as vanilla game, while a checkmark means the ghoul will automatically check its health status when idle and decide whether to use Juggernaut Serum.
